Utils API¶

int read_char(FILE *in, Buffer *buffer, char INTERACTIVE, char *prgm_should_stop)¶

Read a character

Parameters

  • in – Input file on which you want to read the program

  • buffer – Buffer where you want to store the read program

  • INTERACTIVE – Are you in interactive mode, or not ?

  • prgm_should_stop – Value of this pointer is updated by a call to this function. If set to 1, you reached EOF and you should stop evaluating the file you are reading.

Returns

The read caracter, or -1 if EOF or maximal buffer size is reached
